entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
